Consultant and Java (SE/EE) enthusiast Adam Bien (adambien.blog) uses Java since JDK 1.0 and still enjoys writing Java code. Adam occasionally organizes Java EE / HTML 5 / JavaScript / WebStandards workshops at Munich’s airport (http://airhacks.com).
